item.title: iMutSig - a web application to identify the most similar mutational signature using shiny
E-cigarette Product Characteristics and Subsequent Frequency of Cigarette Smoking
item.description: Our paper has been reported in the USC news.

item.title: HiLDA - a statistical approach to investigate differences in mutational signatures
item.description: We propose a hierarchical latent Dirichlet allocation model (HiLDA) for characterizing somatic mutation data in cancer. The method allows us to infer mutational patterns and their relative frequencies in a set of tumor mutational catalogs and to compare the estimated frequencies between tumor sets.
